fsb.config.avatars.tooltip: What will be used download/upload avatars
fsb.config.pings.tooltip: What will be used to send/receive pings
fsb.config.priority.figura.tooltip: Uses only Figura's backend for this setting
fsb.config.priority.figura_fsb.tooltip: Uses Figura's backend if connected to, otherwise trying to use FSB
fsb.config.priority.fsb_figura.tooltip: Uses FSB if server has it, otherwise trying to use Figura's backend
fsb.config.priority.fsb.tooltip: Uses only FSB for this setting
fsb.security.wrong_ehash.desc:
EHash(es) of avatar(s) [%s] sent by server is invalid.
Please check if epassword matches on all your clients.
If it does, server might have been replaced your avatar in it's database.
If does not, set the same epassword on your clients and reupload avatar.
fsb.security.wrong_hash.desc: Server sent you a hash that doesn't match hash of avatar data.
